          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Placing "],
              ["defer f.Close()", [["c"]]],
              [" right after "],
              ["os.Open()", [["c"]]],
              [" makes it easy to audit the code and verify "],
              ["Close", [["c"]]],
              [
                " is always called. This is especially useful for large functions with multiple exit points."
              ]
            ]
          },
